title: Quantum computing: Chattanooga’s technological future, ‘out of the tube’
content: Business Insider writes about the ever-approaching reality of quantum computing for the business industry. This new innovation will perform like the artificial intelligence we are used to —only faster and at a much larger scale. However, unlike AI, which uses existing data from other websites to generate outcomes, a quantum computer solves problems from scratch. Regarding quantum’s futuristic impact, Chattanooga MayorTim Kelly tells Business Insider that “the toothpaste is not going back in the tube.” With a quantum computer already being constructed here in the city, he hopes that this new technology will fundamentally change the way business operates in the community. Read more about how Chattanooga is working to become a hotspot for developing this technological advancement and what that means for the future of our local businesses.
